Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Fridge \Fridge\, v. t. [AS. frician to dance, from free bold. Cf. {Freak}, n.] To rub; to fray. [Obs.] --Sterne.
fridge n : a refrigerator in which the coolant is pumped around by an electric motor [syn: {electric refrigerator}]
